name: taxprofiler-metagenomic-profiling
title: Taxprofiler: Metagenomic Taxonomic Profiling
description: Multi-tool taxonomic profiling of shotgun metagenomic data. Runs Kraken2, MetaPhlAn4, Centrifuge, and Diamond to identify microbial composition with consensus analysis. Ideal for microbiome studies. Samplesheet format: `sample,run_accession,instrument_platform,fastq_1,fastq_2,fasta`
content:
Taxprofiler: Taxonomic Profiling

Multi-tool taxonomic classification of metagenomic sequencing data. Identifies bacteria, archaea, viruses, fungi, and eukaryotes using multiple classifiers for robust microbial community profiling.

Applications

  • Human Microbiome: Gut, oral, skin communities
  • Environmental: Soil, water, air samples
  • Clinical: Infection diagnostics
  • Food Safety: Contamination screening

Key Outputs

  • Taxonomic Profiles: Abundance tables (species, genus, phylum)
  • Consensus Classification: Agreement across tools
  • Krona Plots: Interactive taxonomy visualization
  • Alpha Diversity: Shannon, Simpson indices

Perfect for: Microbiome profiling • Clinical metagenomics • Environmental samples • Consensus taxonomy
